        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="3939" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="3939" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.91</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="407">407</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="66"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>English Fern</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. <b>English Fern</b> was launched in 1890. Top notes are Lavender and Geranium; middle note is Cloves; base notes are Oakmoss, Patchouli and Sandalwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">0</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Not as ferny as expected
                </div>

        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2239601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239601" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thomthomthom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1513527"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1513527.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thomthomthom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1513527">thomthomthom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 10:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>straight up mosquito repellent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="2239601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=2239601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2134567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice out of the shower scent, simple and pleasant. <br />
<br />
For me it's a like, not a love. It's a basic "fougere" fragrance. Lots of cloves and geranium. Along the same line has something like Monsieur by Rogue Perfumery, but I think I prefer that one because this doesn't last long on me at all. Thing is as well, it's discontinued so it's fairly hard to get. I had a small partial bottle of this, but I saw a full boxed bottle in a charity shop for £60 so I thought I'd snap it up at that price. I wouldn't pay anything more than that to be honest though. I've got quite a few penhaligons so this was nice to add to the collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="2134567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=2134567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stephen N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stephen N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169218">Stephen N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was going through a box of samples this weekend and realized "I have one too many samples, I need to start wearing through these."  So today before I left for work, I reached for my sample of this, poured it out in my palm, and slapped it on.  This is, without a doubt, one of the BEST barbershop fougere fragrances I have ever come across.  This was everything I wanted and more.<br />
<br />
And when I was on break at work, looking online for bottles of this, I wanted to CRY when I saw that it was discontinued.  God only knows at this point how long this sample had sat tucked away while I was off looking for a good barbershop fragrance, and I could have had THE ONE long before now if I would have just opened this one up years ago.<br />
<br />
Life is just not fair some times.  (╥﹏╥)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="2039090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=2039090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stellavale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1615992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1615992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stellavale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1615992">stellavale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually got a vintage bottle of this at an estate sale for $5 (and before anyone gets excited, it’s really vintage and doesn’t smell amazing, I just liked the bottle)! I just can’t figure out how old it is so if anyone has info on that please message me! I can’t find information on dating Penhaligon bottles as easily as, say, Chanel bottles. It’s the same style bottle as recent editions but the green bow isn’t as vibrant and the “English fern” is in black not green.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1862909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1862909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1770523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1713955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713955" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Farrque"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1201583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Farrque" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Ambre-Supreme-70274.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70274.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Suprême"title="Ambre Suprême"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201583">Farrque</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-21">12/21/22 00:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Semi-sweet fougere with lots of green camphorous facets. <br />
Oakmoss, sweet mint, pine, galbanum and dried lavender.<br />
Very elegant if you can stand the profile and if you can score yourself a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1713955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1713955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1607467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1607467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tvlampboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167679"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1167679.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tvlampboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Silver-1176.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1176.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver"title="Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1607467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1607467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167679">tvlampboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-21">07/21/22 03:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crisp and thoroughly late Victorian in its feel, this soapy barbershop number opens up with fern and oakmoss galore, then settles into a giant patchoul fest.<br />
<br />
I love it, yes, but it's NOT a safe blind buy save for serious patchouli fanatics like myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1607467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1607467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1603384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1603384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SilkyWoods"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1507238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SilkyWoods" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Shunkoin-16449.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16449.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shunkoin"title="Shunkoin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1603384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1603384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507238">SilkyWoods</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-15">07/15/22 01:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not sure why but the opening of this is straight up fennel on my skin. Dry down is better, but not something I would wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1603384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1603384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fougère fragrance in the most minimalistic manner possible. It contains the core defining elements: lavender, geranium, coumarin and oakmoss, and nothing more. <br />
<br />
Any sandalwood if at all present is not perceptible to me. It is serious, business like, aromatic (lavender), dry and sweet (due to tonka). Very versatile, good for formal occasions in cool weather (spring/autumn).<br />
<br />
This scent profile seems too basic to be worth the price, for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1527655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1527655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1491501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1491501" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kaylovely"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329847"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329847.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kaylovely" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alexandre-J/Zafeer-Oud-Vanille-22361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zafeer Oud Vanille"title="Zafeer Oud Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1491501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1491501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329847">Kaylovely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-26">01/26/22 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1895 wow!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1491501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1491501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1452857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1452857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dick Turpin Esq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14862.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dick Turpin Esq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Declaration-307.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.307.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Declaration"title="Declaration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1452857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1452857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14862">Dick Turpin Esq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-26">11/26/21 16:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would like, if I may, to take you on a strange journey. Dr Jekyll was performing his usual morally apathetic and anatomically risky science experiments, mixing headache inducing quantities of Geranium with overbearing Victorian Clove mouthwash he had stolen from the vile dental training hospital.<br />
<br />
He fortifed the noxious elixir with some old Tar kitchen soap cream called “swarfega” (made in Derbyshire England), which is a dark green, gelatinous, thixotropic substance used to clean grease, oil, printer's ink, or hydrophobic dirt off the skin when he’d been working on his new fangled motor car (which none the less, always left his fingernails disconcertingly filthy).<br />
<br />
He inhaled this brutish crude concoction and proceeded to smear it on his jowls. The diabolical change was immediate; animalistic hair growth on his cheeks, his voice rasping as if for clean air, eye’s burning with toxicity and his whole persona transformed into the peculiar case of Mr Hyde. Too much Geranium his brain screamed! Oakmoss is too Obvious! Why did I add Patchouli and not ANY FERN! These Cloves are Killing my brain cells! Snarling and in a fury at the suffocating green reek on his cheeks and jowls, he fled into the night seeking to spread violence and vice, in a haze of English Fern induced psychosis.<br />
<br />
I myself have since tried Dr Jekyll formulation which he evidently bestowed on Mr Penhaligon, as even the smallest vial of this substance, was so distressing to me that I felt only steel wool would remove the odour, such is its primitive formulation, poor balance and jarring notes.<br />
<br />
Should you really want to smell as if you were a Victorian gentleman and felt that your fragrance choices were limited to either, lemons, sandalwood, horse manure or English fern, I would recommend Trumper’s which actually does justice to the fougere.  [originally reviewed 2010, on October 21st].</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1452857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1452857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1374560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1374560" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paycrchf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="paycrchf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Millesime-Imperial-466.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.466.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Millésime Impérial"title="Millésime Impérial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1374560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1374560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230344">paycrchf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-12">07/12/21 05:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like toilet products. Not something I’d wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3939"comment_id="1374560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/English-Fern-3939.html?ccid=1374560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1368329" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1368329" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JREL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JREL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1368329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1368329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);
